div.bibl: The Greek Press, July 31, 1929SEGINEING OF A TRIPOLITA WOMEN'S CLUB

body.p: We are proud to announce that through the efforts of Helen S. Giannopoulos and Marikas N. Malliris, all women of Tripolitan desecent are invited to attend a meeting at Logan Square Auditorium, for the purpose of starting a philanthropic society to be named Philanthropic Society of Tripolitan Women and Misses.
We will publish later the aims and purposes of this club.
